Episodes.Title: Stick or Twist
Episodes.Actors: Tom Hardy, Pierce Brosnan, Paddy Considine
Episodes.Plot: Harry Da Souza is called upon to make a problem disappear after a night out goes awry for the sons of two warring crime families. As boss Richie Stevenson looks to pin blame, patriarch Conrad Harrigan gathers his clan with a plan.

Episodes.Title: Jigsaw Puzzle
Episodes.Actors: Tom Hardy, Pierce Brosnan, Paddy Considine
Episodes.Plot: Harry must deal with the aftermath of the Harrigan family meeting.

Episodes.Title: Plan B
Episodes.Actors: Tom Hardy, Pierce Brosnan, Paddy Considine
Episodes.Plot: Richie makes his move, putting the Harrigans on high alert. Conrad and Maeve lock horns over Eddie but agree on a plan B.

Episodes.Title: Rat Trap
Episodes.Actors: Tom Hardy, Pierce Brosnan, Paddy Considine
Episodes.Plot: Harry pays a visit to Antoine at the urging of Bella. Fisk and Mukasa trade theories.

Episodes.Title: Funeral for a Friend
Episodes.Actors: Anson Boon, Pierce Brosnan, Mandeep Dhillon

Episodes.Title: Antwerp Blues
Episodes.Actors: Paddy Considine, Jasmine Jobson, Geoff Bell
Episodes.Plot: In the aftermath of Plan B, Conrad twists the knife and Fisk has a realization: this is war. Maeve gives Eddie a lesson in the art of chess. Richie takes the bait. Harry goes searching for Seraphina and Brendan, who've gone rogue.

Episodes.Title: The Crossroads
Episodes.Actors: Tom Hardy, Pierce Brosnan, Paddy Considine
Episodes.Plot: In the Cotswolds, O'Hara points out the elephant in the room. Maeve pivots, testing Conrad's resolve. Alice comes to Jan for a favor. Eddie and Gina make common cause. Harry, with the clock ticking, takes extreme measures.

Episodes.Title: Helter Skelter
Episodes.Actors: Tom Hardy, Pierce Brosnan, Paddy Considine
Episodes.Plot: Maeve extends an olive branch. Kevin questions the wisdom of a sit down with Jaime. Tattersall offers Fisk and Mukasa a new point of entry. Harry comes to Kat for a favor as Richie, at the Sinful Monkey, contemplates a new affilia...

Episodes.Title: Beggars Banquet
Episodes.Actors: Tom Hardy, Pierce Brosnan, Paddy Considine
Episodes.Plot: Bella does a runner to London. Tattersall gets Alice's tootsies tapping. Kevin confronts his past. The Harrigans sit down for a normal family dinner.

Episodes.Title: Episode #1.10
Episodes.Actors: Anson Boon, Pierce Brosnan, Mandeep Dhillon
